db:abstract.db:para: This example demonstrates the implementation of accessible buttons.

db:article.db:para: Accessibility demonstrates QML types that are augmented with meta-data for accessibility systems. For more information, visit the Accessibility page.

db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
